wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Fairgrieve Dorward (27 March 1916, Galashiels - 5 March 1941, Castle Bytham, Lincolnshire) also known as Tom or Tommy Dorward was a Scotland international rugby union player. He died as the result of wounds received during World War II.

response: Arthurs brother Tom Dorward was also capped for Scotland.

response: *Arthur Dorward and Tom Dorward; brothers. Arthur and Tom are distantly related to New Zealand international Ali Williams
